mapper.select:
select * from t_balance_log
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and balance_log_phone=#{balanceLogPhone}
order by balance_log_id desc limit #{currentPage}, 20

select count(*) from t_balance_log
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and balance_log_phone=#{balanceLogPhone}

select sum(balance_log_money) as balanceLogMoney,day(create_time) as createTime from t_balance_log
balance_log_money >= 0
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by day(create_time);

select sum(balance_log_service1) as balanceLogService1, sum(balance_log_service2) as balanceLogService2, sum(balance_log_service3) as balanceLogService3,sum(balance_log_service4) as balanceLogService4, sum(balance_log_service5) as balanceLogService5,day(create_time) as createTime from t_balance_log
balance_log_money >= 0 and balance_log_service2 >= 0 and balance_log_service3 >= 0 and balance_log_service4 >= 0 and balance_log_service5 >= 0
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by day(create_time);

select sum(balance_log_money) as balanceLogMoney,day(create_time) as createTime from t_balance_log
balance_log_money <= 0
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by day(create_time);

select sum(balance_log_service1) as balanceLogService1, sum(balance_log_service2) as balanceLogService2, sum(balance_log_service3) as balanceLogService3,sum(balance_log_service4) as balanceLogService4, sum(balance_log_service5) as balanceLogService5,day(create_time) as createTime from t_balance_log
balance_log_service1 <= 0 and balance_log_service2 <= 0 and balance_log_service3 <= 0 and balance_log_service4 <= 0 and balance_log_service5 <= 0
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by day(create_time);
